text: "You're Easy on the Eyes" is a song co-written and recorded by Canadian country music artist Terri Clark. It was released in August 1998 as the second single from her CD, How I Feel, it spent three weeks at the top of the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks (now Hot Country Songs) chart, giving Clark her first Number One single in the United States. It was written by Clark, Tom Shapiro and Chris Waters. ==Music video== The music video was directed by Steven Goldmann.http://www.octopusmediaink.com/StevenGoldmann.html ==Chart performance== "You're Easy on the Eyes" debuted at number 55 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks for the week of August 29, 1998. {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1998–1999) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !scope="col"|Chart (1998) !scope="col"|Position |- | Canada Country Tracks (RPM) | align="center" | 61 |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !scope="col"|Chart (1999) !scope="col"|Position |- | US Country Songs (Billboard) | align="center" | 54 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 singles Category:Billboard Hot Country Songs number-one singles Category:1998 songs Category:Terri Clark songs Category:Songs written by Tom Shapiro Category:RPM Country Tracks number-one singles Category:Songs written by Terri Clark Category:Songs written by Chris Waters Category:Song recordings produced by Keith Stegall Category:Mercury Records singles Category:Music videos directed by Steven Goldmann
